item.title: Annotating the Drosophila Genome
item.description: A Bioinformatics Study & ReportA paper I wrote for a bioinformatics class several years ago in which I annotated part of the Drosophila Erecta genome (Fosmid 14) as part of a concerted effort to annotate the entire genome.
